{{also|杏鲍菇}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=杏鲍菇}}

===Etymology===
[[杏]] ([[apricot]]) + [[鮑]] ([[abalone]]) + [[菇]] ([[mushroom]])
: It got this name because this type of mushroom is said to smell like [[apricots]] and taste like [[abalone]].

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=xìngbàogū
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[king oyster mushroom]], a species of edible [[mushroom]] (species ''[[w:Pleurotus eryngii|Pleurotus eryngii]]'')

====Synonyms====
* {{l|zh|刺芹側耳}}
* {{l|zh|刺芹菇}}
